agent_name.name: agent_name
agent_name.prompt: Name to be assigned to the Datasync agent

ip_address.name: ip_address
ip_address.prompt: IP where the datasync agent service is running. DataSync Agent must be accessible on port 80 from where Terraform is running.

nfs_location_name.name: nfs_location_name
nfs_location_name.prompt: Specify a name for this nfs location

server_hostname.name: server_hostname
server_hostname.prompt: (Source) The IP address or DNS name of the NFS server.

nfs_subdirectory.name: nfs_subdirectory
nfs_subdirectory.prompt: (Source) Subdirectory within the NFS server to perform actions as source. Should be exported by the NFS server.

s3_bucket_name.name: s3_bucket_name
s3_bucket_name.prompt: (Destination) S3 Bucket name for the destination.

s3_object_prefix.name: s3_object_prefix
s3_object_prefix.prompt: (Destination) Prefix to perform actions within the S3 bucket.

bucket_access_role_name.name: bucket_access_role_name
bucket_access_role_name.prompt: IAM Role name used to connect to the S3 Bucket.

endpoint_vpc_id.name: endpoint_vpc_id
endpoint_vpc_id.prompt: The ID of the VPC in which the vpc endpoint will be used.

endpoint_security_group_ids.name: endpoint_security_group_ids
endpoint_security_group_ids.prompt: The ID of one or more security groups to associate with the network interface for the vpc endpoint.

endpoint_subnet_ids.name: endpoint_subnet_ids
endpoint_subnet_ids.prompt: The ID of one or more subnets in which to create a network interface for the vpc endpoint.

agent_security_groups_ids.name: agent_security_groups_ids
agent_security_groups_ids.prompt: The Id of the security group used to assing to your datasync agent.

agent_subnet_ids.name: agent_subnet_ids
agent_subnet_ids.prompt: The subnet id in which DataSync will create elastic network interface for the data transfer task.

name.name: Name
name.prompt: Enter RC Name with no spaces

ds_task_name.name: ds_task_name
ds_task_name.prompt: Enter task name with no spaces

dst_schedule_expression.name: dst_schedule_expression
dst_schedule_expression.prompt: Specifies the schedule you want your task to use for repeated executions.
